booking.pm-sp: Book via the %s PeakESL Social Program %s Learn more %s about how we provide free education
booking.socialprogram-tooltip: We use donations to provide free lessons and education to children and people without financial possibilities.

register.headline: –ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤ –∫ —É—Ä–æ–∫–∞–º —Å PeakESL?
register.socialTeacher: I can teach Social Program Students for free

settings.socialprogram-text: We can provide you with free lessons in case you don't have access or currently not the financial possibilities. Lessons are being held by volunteering teachers or being payed by the PeakESL Social Fund.

cta.headline: Building the %s future of education
cta.text: We at PeakESL are empowered by the vision to eduacte children around the globe, no matter how there financial possibilities might be. Education is a human right we are fighting for.

social-program.headline: Free education with the PeakESL Social Program
social-program.partners-text: The PeakESL Social Program cannot live without the amazing help of our partners and contributors. In order to provide our free education for children in need, we rely on donations from companies, organisations, people, our students and teachers. Only together we can keep this important project alive.
social-program.st1: Students that can't afford lessons sign up and simply enroll with one click in the program. We provide those students with volunteering teachers or, if no suitable is available, we pay for the lesson using the PeakESL Social Fund. %s Teachers on PeakESL can opt-in to give volunteering lessons to students next to giving regular payed lessons. It's their choice and they can change this setting anytime.
social-program.st2: Contributions from our partners, people, students and teachers are all going into the fund.%sThe fund is being used to pay for the operational costs of the project - the infrastructure, employees making this project possible and teachers.
social-program.students-text: We provide students with no financial possibilities with free education - online lessons with our teachers on PeakESL. Simply sign up and book your first lesson - either with a volunteering teacher, or we pay for the lesson using the PeakESL Social Fund.
social-program.subheadline: Providing students with free online teaching
social-program.t1: The PeakESL Social Program provides lessons to students who can't afford it themselves. If you can't afford the lessons, don't worry, we will take care of it. Your lessons will be held by volunteering teachers or we pay using the PeakESL Social Program Fund.
social-program.teachers-text: Help raising education levels across the globe with teaching as a volunteer for Social Students on PeakESL. You deliver lessons for free to children who couldn't otherwise afford to be taught.

social-program-partner.cta-text: Be part of our vision providing access to free education to all children around the world.%sWe are excited about the future we are building, are you ready to join?
social-program-partner.headline:
Making education accessible.
Creating Futures.
social-program-partner.subheadline: PeakESL Social Program helps children get the education we think they deserve while at the same time we build jobs for teachers worldwide.
social-program-partner.t1: Students profit from the PeakESL Social Program if they cannot afford tutoring lessons by themselves or don't have access to schools. We provide those students with the tools and guidance required and pay for their lessons.
social-program-partner.t2: We help teachers to get back into a job where they can provide for themselves and their family. We are also working on our own program to train people to become teachers on PeakESL.
social-program-partner.t3: Bringing high quality education to everyone - that is PeakESL's vision. No matter of heritage, location or the current situation, with our PeakESL teachers we want to give every child sufficient education to be successfull in life.
social-program-partner.t4: If you are interested in a partnership or a special contribution, please reach out to us directly at %s to discuss in detail.%sWe are constantly looking into all directions to secure funding for our Social Program and progressing with our vision.

social-program-student.cta-text: Be part of our vision providing access to free education to all children around the world.%sWe are excited about the future we are building, are you ready to join?
social-program-student.headline: Get tutoring lessons%s- even if you can't pay
social-program-student.social-student-option: Enroll in the PeakESL Social Program
social-program-student.subheadline: Teach for free or receive compensation from our PeakESL Social Fund to improve our children future.
social-program-student.t1: The PeakESL Social Program provides lessons to students who can't afford it themselves. If you can't afford the lessons, don't worry, we will take care of it. Your lessons will be held by volunteering teachers or we pay using the PeakESL Social Fund.
social-program-student.t2: Find your perfect online teacher on PeakESL. Select according to your requirements, set lessons at times that work for you. Learn on the PeakESL platform using our virtual classroom and secure payment processing.

social-program-teacher.cta-text: Be part of our vision providing access to free education to all children around the world.%sWe are excited about the future we are building, are you ready to join?
social-program-teacher.headline: Teaching Students that don't have access to education
social-program-teacher.subheadline: Teach for free or receive compensation from our PeakESL Social Fund to improve our children future.
social-program-teacher.t1: The PeakESL Social Program provides lessons to students who can't afford it themselves. You can either teach on a voluntary basis or we pay you from the PeakESL Social Funds. This fund is filled by donations.
social-program-teacher.t2: We provide you all the tools you need to start. Sign up, fill out your profile and wait for the first student booking a lesson. You get paid right after each regular lesson that is not done for the PeakESL Social Program.

teacher.socialTeacherTooltip: I am a volunteer for the PeakESL Social Program

teacherSettings.social-program-optin: I can teach Social Program Students for free
teacherSettings.social-program-text: With the PeakESL Social Program we provide lessons for children that cannot afford or do not have access to education. You can help us spread knowledge to everyone around the globe.

title.social-program-partners: Contributing to the Social Program - PeakESL
